front.title: Description of Entities Identified by the 'tag' URI Scheme

abstract.t: This document specifies automated description resolution mechanism for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) in the "tag" scheme. Tag URIs (also known as "tags") are designed to be non-dereferenceable, however it may be useful for a tag minter to optinally provide a public easily accessible description of the entity associated with a tag.
